channel.title: Darken Cards | Home
channel.description: Welcome to the Darken Cards home page. See what we are all about !

item.title: Darken Cards | About
item.description: Read everything about our company and what we do. Also read about our author and check out his work !

item.title: Darken Cards | Rules
item.description: Learn rules of the game and start winning !

item.title: Darken Cards | Contact
item.description: Get in touch with us ! Fill the form and tell us what you think about our game. We can't wait to hear from you !

item.title: Darken Cards | Assassins
item.description: Here you can see all our assassins ! Take your pick !

item.title: Darken Cards | Tanks
item.description: Here you can see all our tanks ! Take your pick !

item.title: Darken Cards | Supports
item.description: Here you can see all our supports ! Take your pick !

item.title: Darken Cards | Andros
item.description: Check out Andros, a deadly assissin who lost a lot as a kid !

item.title: Darken Cards | Nora
item.description: Check out Nora, a little shadowy girl that kills her targets fast and swift.

item.title: Darken Cards | Pharah
item.description: See Pharah, a dangerous queen on a quest to conquer all land !

item.title: Darken Cards | Lagos
item.description: Meet Lagos, a dwarf and a keeper of tomb. Nobody gets past him !

item.title: Darken Cards | Jorah
item.description: Meet Jorah, a royal general and a humble man with a sad family story.

item.title: Darken Cards | Levion
item.description: We introduce to you Levion, the Ice Devil, and the biggest evil in whole game !

item.title: Darken Cards | Sargon
item.description: Check out Sargon, a blind clairvoyant that can see and alter future and shape it how he wants.

item.title: Darken Cards | Lorena
item.description: Meet Lorena, master of poison and an evil queen that wants to take revenge on her family.

item.title: Darken Cards | Rena and Mark
item.description: Meet our two love birds, Rena and Mark ! Dont let their love full you, they are very dangerous.
